titleStmt.title: His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfaxes protestation, in the name of himselfe, and the rest of the army. The declaration of the commaltee [sic] of souldiers, their answer to the Scots declaration, and the resolutions of the army concerning the City of London.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Corbet, Roger.
England and Wales. Army.

notesStmt.note: Consists of 3 documents: a letter dated and signed St. Albones, Iune the 13. 1647. R. Corbet; Fairfax's Protestation; and "The desires of the army".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
